title: shared_db.get_configuration OUTPUT Dictionary
description: The output dictionary from the get_configuration call.

admin_database.description: Admin database name used for URL connection string. Typically postgres for PostgreSQL RDS

admin_username.description: Admin (super user) database user name used for URL connection string. Typically postgres for PostgreSQL RDS

admin_password.description: Admin database user password used for URL connection string.

user_username.description: Application non-privelaged database user name used for URL connection string.

user_password.description: Application user database password used for URL connection string.

user_database.description: Application user database name used for URL connection string.

host.description: Database host address used for URL connection string.

port.description: Database port used for URL connection string. Typically 5432 for PostgreSQL RDS.
